data.title: Screening of the movie "Lída Baarová"
data.meta_description: On June 29, 2018 the Czech and Slovak Embassies in Lebanon screened the movie  "Lída Baarová“. The film  was introduced
data.text:
On June 29, 2018 the Czech and Slovak Embassies in Lebanon - as the part of the commemoration of the 100th Anniversary of Czechoslovakia – organized the outdoor movie night in the Yarzé Country Club. The movie was "Lída Baarová“ and it was introduced by its Director Filip Renč.

We partnered with our local sport Club (Yarzé Country Club), a great outdoor movie engineer (Wide Vision) and a exquisite food provider (Food and Design). The beer was provided by Budějovický Budvar Thanks to our guests and partners, the result was surprisingly pleasant and we managed to create something very close to the atmosphere of the Czechoslovak thirties in the heart of Lebanon. The newspaper L'Orient-Le Jour published an article about the event.

Judge yourself in our memory clip: „Lída Baarová“ on June 29, 2018, in the Yarzé Country Club !

We hope everybody had fun and we look forward to seeing you at the next event !
